name: Monster bar simulator
description:
You are a bartender in a crypt. Your clients are creepy monsters. Whether you cater to their special tastes or get eaten is up to you! Muahahahaha!

Prepare cocktails from improvised ingredients, guess the desire of customers, catch the perfect balance between strenght and abomination! If you have no idea what is the mix of ectoplasma, acid and fish eye, then you are in the right place.

  • 15 levels
  • 14 unique characters
  • 11 ingredients
  • 3 ends

Сontrol:

Esc — pause, difficulty selection;
Left Mouse button — controls the dialog, moving ingredients;
Right Mouse button — instant purchase.
